title: World Dataviz Prize: The Longlist
content:
We shared three datasets about the past, present and future of societies, tech & government. You created over 450 beautiful visualisations, infographics and interactives.

Over the past few nights, we’ve been carefully distilling the longlists:

» Poster / Static Visualisations
» Interactives

The shortlist will be announced later this week followed by the prize winners next week at the World Government Summit. Stay tuned!
author: David McCandless
